sentences.en: "Eat before Jul 14" was stamped on the label.
sentences.cn: 标签上印着“请于7月14日前食用”。

sentences.en: "Eat before JULY 14" was stamped on the label.
sentences.cn: 标签上盖有“7月14日前食用”的戳记。

sentences.en: A large address label was gummed to the package.
sentences.cn: 包装袋上贴上了一大张地址签条。

sentences.en: Affix the blue airmail label and leave the rest to us.
sentences.cn: 贴上蓝色的空邮标签，其余的事情交给我们。

sentences.en: He peered at the label on the bottle.
sentences.cn: 他仔细地看着瓶上的标签。

sentences.en: I can't bear people who make judgements and label me.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌人们对我品头论足。

sentences.en: It requires foreign frozen-food imports to be clearly labelled.
sentences.cn: 它要求外国进口冷冻食品要粘贴明确的标签。

sentences.en: It was on the Virgin label.
sentences.cn: 它由维京唱片公司发行。

sentences.en: One wine shop is coining money selling Wembley-label champagne.
sentences.cn: 一家葡萄酒商店正在靠出售威丽牌子的香槟大把大把赚钱。

sentences.en: She landed a contract with record label EMI.
sentences.cn: 她获得了一份与百代唱片公司的合约。

sentences.en: Someone has stuck a label on the crate.
sentences.cn: 有人在板条箱上贴了标签.

sentences.en: The catalog is organized alphabetically by label name.
sentences.cn: 这个目录按标签名的字母顺序排列而成。

sentences.en: The label is on the inner side of the box.
The label should be firmly affixed to the package.
sentences.cn: 这张标签应该牢牢地贴在包裹上。

sentences.en: The washing instructions are on the label.
They thought the feminist label was too worthy.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得女权主义者这个称谓太抬举她们了。

phrases.tran_cn: 地址卷标；地址标号；贴头（印写收件人地址的小纸签）
条形码标记；条件码标记
电脑标签机；标记印字机；票据打印机
标签印刷机，商标印刷机
自有品牌；私有品牌；商店自用品牌

trans.tran_cn: 标签，标记，称谓，唱片公司
trans.tran_en: a piece of paper or another material that is attached to something and gives information about it

trans.tran_cn: 贴标签于，用标签表明，（尤指不公平地）把…称之为
trans.tran_en: to attach a label onto something or write information on something
to attach a label onto something or write information on something
